humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, the sentinel lymph node (SLN #1) was negative for metastases (0/1). This information aligns with New Rule 11 and Rule 8, which state that N0 indicates no metastatic carcinoma in all assessed lymph nodes. Therefore, the N stage for this patient's cancer is N0.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that the sentinel lymph node (SLN #1) was negative for metastases (0/1). This means that there is no evidence of cancer in the lymph nodes. Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N0.
